Cost_by_weight
==============

.. table:: Algorithm
   :widths: 15 15 15

   +------------------------+-----------------------------------+-----------------------------------------+
   | **Algorithm Name**     | **What is this algorithm for?**   | **Description**                         |
   +========================+===================================+=========================================+
   | cost_by_weight         | Cost Element                      | Cost per unit mass.                     |
